title: Delete and email
creator: fmjack
content: When I delete an email on my Android thunderbird app it does not really put it in the deleted folder on the server. How do I correct this?

title: Android app not syncing with desktop.
creator: leffleradam369
content:
Hello,

I have setup my desktop app the way I like it. And I'm trying to get it synced with my android app. It shows the email addresses in left side bar. And has unified mailbox and outbox (both empty in all accounts) as the only folders. I am also having a problem getting my outlook.com email to work properly on the desktop app.

Please help ASAP
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/135.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36
